title: Sh*t Show Podcast: The Invasion(s) of the Body Snatchers (1956, 2007)

media:group.media:title: Sh*t Show Podcast: The Invasion(s) of the Body Snatchers (1956, 2007)
media:group.media:description:
Pretending you’re a pod person is hard. Let’s talk about how difficult it was to adapt The Body Snatchers, from the 1956’s Invasions of the Body Snatchers to 2007’s The Invasion where both films changed titles, suffered reshoots, and altered endings.

You can also listen to this episode (and more) in podcast form!

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram: https://linktr.ee/itwasashtshow

In the entertainment world, there are millions of dollars on the line and troubled productions are bound to happen. And we are going to talk about these disastrous, never ending, and sometimes dangerous productions. From the creators of WTF Happened To This Movie?, It Was A Sh*t Show is a video essay/documentary/podcast series looking at some of your favorite films and tv shows, and why they were such a nightmare to make.

Chapters:
00:00 - Teaser
01:11 - Intro
06:02 - The Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1956)
18:00 - The Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1978)
29:43 - The Body Snatchers (1993)
35:55 - The Invasion (2007)
